attributes.additional_details:
British youth today has no sense of belonging, pride or respect for themselves or their community.

Education and discipline are the basis of creating this self respect and respect for the community.

Parents, police and authorities are unable to provide that due to the overzealous human rights issues that youth today are no longer taught right from wrong.
Youth here have too much priviledge and freedom to recognise and value what they have.

Bring back National Service so that we can instil discipline, pride and self respect. We can also improve our country security.

Empower the educators and police to discipline the youth without fear of prosecution. We can no longer spread the rod!
